about.summary: Adds support for the English language to the 'koRpus' package. To ask for help, report bugs, suggest feature improvements, or discuss the global development of the package, please consider subscribing to the koRpus-dev mailing list (<http://korpusml.reaktanz.de>).

name: r-korpus.lang.en
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1-3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-korpus.lang.en
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/koRpus.lang.en_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/koRpus.lang.en/koRpus.lang.en_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3a9aab3a6ced9991deaf79050cdd88b9215bff80f5ac8761e88dc3d24bed7f04

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-korpus >=0.11_2
    - r-sylly.en
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-korpus >=0.11_2
    - r-sylly.en

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('koRpus.lang.en')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('koRpus.lang.en')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://reaktanz.de/?c=hacking&s=koRpus
  license: GPL (>= 3)
  summary: Adds support for the English language to the 'koRpus' package. To ask for help, report
    bugs, suggest feature improvements, or discuss the global development of the package,
    please consider subscribing to the koRpus-dev mailing list (<http://korpusml.reaktanz.de>).
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - philip-khor

# Package: koRpus.lang.en
# Type: Package
# Title: Language Support for 'koRpus' Package: English
# Depends: R (>= 3.1),koRpus (>= 0.11-2)
# Imports: methods,sylly.en
# Description: Adds support for the English language to the 'koRpus' package. To ask for help, report bugs, suggest feature improvements, or discuss the global development of the package, please consider subscribing to the koRpus-dev mailing list (<http://korpusml.reaktanz.de>).
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyLoad: yes
# URL: https://reaktanz.de/?c=hacking&s=koRpus
# BugReports: https://github.com/unDocUMeantIt/koRpus.lang.en/issues
# Authors@R: c(person(given="Meik", family="Michalke", email="meik.michalke@hhu.de", role=c("aut", "cre")), person(given="Elen", family="Le Foll", role=c("ctb"), comment="BNC tagset"))
# Version: 0.1-3
# Date: 2019-05-13
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-05-13 21:27:26 UTC; m
# Author: Meik Michalke [aut, cre], Elen Le Foll [ctb] (BNC tagset)
# Maintainer: Meik Michalke <meik.michalke@hhu.de>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-05-13 22:40:03 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
